body_html: You might be able to do something similar to what our pip package building process does, where we just depend on the things we need, and then we copy everything we want from the foo.runfiles/ symlink tree structure. There are other ways of doing it.

body: You might be able to do something similar to what our pip package building process does, where we just depend on the things we need, and then we copy everything we want from the foo.runfiles/ symlink tree structure. There are other ways of doing it.
